import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import api from '../../services/api' export default function UserList() { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function loadUser() { const response = await api.get('/users') setUsers(response.data) } loadUser() }, []) console.log(users) return ( <> Criar usuário { users.map(user => ( ))}
Nome E-mail Rua Número
{user.name} {user.email} {user.address.street} {user.address.number} Editar Excluir
) }
